experience.description: Collaborated with the AWS S3 team to optimize data retrieval latency by 15% through the implementation of a distributed caching mechanism using Java. Assisted in the deployment of microservices and participated in daily stand-ups and code reviews.

Developed and maintained high-performance backend modules in C++ for a financial data processing application. Reduced system downtime by 10% by identifying and fixing memory leaks and optimizing database queries.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
